title: Patch Notes
content:
. Fixed a camera shot after giving food to the owlbear cub.

Tutorial and Act I

Fixed Shadowheart's kissing animation playing before you actually chose the dialogue option indicating you wished to do so. Fixed a lighting pop in the dialogue with Us on the nautiloid before you've pried it out of the skull. Fixed some popping shadows on the nautiloid during the brain extraction.
